title: Great Movies (Tell Me Why #79)(gnv64)
description:
Great Movies (Tell Me Why #79)
Manorama | April 2013 | PDF | 96 pages | 17 mb

A simple lens, a candle as a source of light, and of course, a beautiful name too, that's all about that simple device - the Magic Lantern.
Born in the 17th century, to project medical pictures, this device got a different role in another world. It is the ancestor of today's movie projectors.
Movies revolutionised and transformed the world of entertainment. No other media form could dream qf the glitter, glory and glamour, the reel life has. Movie makers - the dream merchants with art in their heart and business in their brain, have made it a thriving, million dollar industry.
In this issue of Tell Me Why, we are projecting some of the great movies that kept the world spellbound!
